    • Method Detail

      • addPrefix

        public static java.lang.String addPrefix(java.lang.String name)

      • registerCommand

        private static void registerCommand(Command command,
                                    java.lang.String name,
                                    int idHint)
        Registers a command. This method is to only be internally executed by DiscLoader itself
        Mod makers should never call this method, it is considered bad practice, and will stop the client from starting up in the future
        Parameters:
        command - The command to register
        name - The namespaced name of the command
        idHint - what the command's id should be if no other command is already registered with the id

      • registerCommand

        public static void registerCommand(Command command,
                                   java.lang.String name)
        Registers a command.
        Parameters:
        command - The command to be registered
        name - A unique name for the command. It is strongly recommended that this should be the command's unlocalized name
